Package hospitalsystem.inventorycontrol

Class AdminInventoryControl

java.lang.Object
hospitalsystem.inventorycontrol.InventoryControl
hospitalsystem.inventorycontrol.AdminInventoryControl
public class AdminInventoryControl extends InventoryControl
Manages administrator-specific inventory operations. Provides functionality for stock management, including adding/removing stock, managing expired medicine, and handling replenishment requests.
Since:
2024-11-19
Author:
An Xian

  • Method Details

    • manageStock

      public static void manageStock(Scanner sc)
      Interactive method for managing medicine stock levels. Allows administrators to add or remove stock quantities.
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner object for reading user input

    • addStock

      public static void addStock(Medicine medicine, int quantity, Scanner sc)
      Adds new stock to a specific medicine batch. Creates a new batch with specified quantity and expiration date.
      Parameters:
      medicine - Medicine object to add stock to
      quantity - Amount of stock to add
      sc - Scanner object for reading expiration date input

    • removeStock

      public static void removeStock(Medicine medicine, int quantity)
      Removes specified quantity of stock from medicine batches. Removes from oldest batches first and handles batch depletion.
      Parameters:
      medicine - Medicine object to remove stock from
      quantity - Amount of stock to remove

    • removeExpiredStock

      public static void removeExpiredStock()
      Removes all expired medicine batches from inventory. Checks expiration dates against current date and removes expired stock.

    • addNewMedicine

      public static void addNewMedicine(Scanner sc)
      Adds a new medicine to the inventory system. Collects medicine details and creates initial stock batch.
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner object for reading medicine details

    • updateLowStockAlert

      public static void updateLowStockAlert(Scanner sc)
      Updates the low stock alert level for a specific medicine.
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner object for reading new alert level

    • manageRequests

      public static void manageRequests(Scanner sc)
      Manages replenishment requests from pharmacists. Allows administrators to approve or reject requests and update stock accordingly.
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner object for reading input
